level.heading: Representation.
level.text: The Authority shall be represented by its General Counsel and other attorneys, as necessary, and, notwithstanding any other provision of law, shall not be subject to the oversight of the Corporation Counsel for the District government.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90-day) addition of section, see notes following ยง 6-201.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 13-105, see notes following ยง 6-201.
